mapper.insert: insert into pobo_notify (request_sn, ret_code, ret_msg, merchant_id, order_date, order_status, order_time, txn_amt, fee, notify_url, sign_type, signature) values (#{pn.requestSN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pn.retCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pn.retMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pn.merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pn.orderDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pn.orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pn.orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pn.txnAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pn.fee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pn.notifyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pn.signType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pn.signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
